The current Prime Minister of India is Narendra Modi. He was elected in 2014 and re-elected in 2019. He is the 14th and current prime minister of India, in office since 26 May 2014. Modi was the chief minister of Gujarat from 2001 to 2014 and is the leader of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). He is a member of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS), a Hindu nationalist volunteer organisation.

Modi was born into a poor family in Vadnagar, Gujarat. He was raised by his mother, Heeraben, after his father, Damodardas Modi, died when he was eight years old. Modi joined the RSS at the age of eight and became a full-time worker at the age of 17. He was appointed general secretary of the BJP in Gujarat in 1985 and became the chief minister of Gujarat in 2001.

Modi's tenure as chief minister of Gujarat was marked by economic growth and development. However, he was also accused of being responsible for the 2002 Gujarat riots, in which more than 1,000 people, mostly Muslims, were killed. Modi has denied any wrongdoing and has been cleared of all charges by the courts.

Modi led the BJP to victory in the 2014 Indian general election. He became the first prime minister to be born after India's independence in 1947. Modi has been credited with improving India's economy and image abroad. He has also been criticized for his Hindu nationalist policies and for his handling of the economy.

BCA stands for Bachelor of Computer Applications. It is a three-year undergraduate course in computer science and information technology. The course covers a wide range of topics, including programming, software engineering, data structures, algorithms, operating systems, database management systems, and computer networks. BCA graduates are typically employed as software developers, web developers, system administrators, and IT support professionals.

BCA is a popular course among students who want to pursue a career in the IT industry. The course provides students with the knowledge and skills they need to work in a variety of IT jobs. BCA graduates are also well-prepared for further studies in computer science or information technology.

If you are interested in pursuing a career in the IT industry, BCA is a good option for you. The course will provide you with the knowledge and skills you need to be successful in this field.

questions.questions: what is the distant of moon from earth
questions.answer:
The average distance between the Moon and Earth is 238,900 miles (384,400 kilometers). This distance varies because the Moon's orbit around Earth is not a perfect circle. The Moon's closest approach to Earth is called perigee, and its farthest distance is called apogee. The Moon's perigee distance is 225,622 miles (363,304 kilometers), and its apogee distance is 252,088 miles (405,504 kilometers).

The Moon's orbit around Earth takes 27.3 days to complete. The Moon's rotation on its axis also takes 27.3 days, which is why we always see the same side of the Moon from Earth.

The Moon is the fifth largest moon in the Solar System. It is the largest moon relative to the size of its planet in the Solar System. The Moon is thought to have formed about 4.51 billion years ago, not long after Earth. The most widely accepted explanation is that the Moon formed from the debris left over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars-sized body called Theia.

The Moon has a significant effect on Earth. It stabilizes Earth's orbit and helps to moderate Earth's climate. The Moon's gravity also causes the tides on Earth.

The Moon is a fascinating and important part of our solar system. It is a beautiful object to look at, and it has a profound effect on Earth.

questions.questions: how far is moon from earth
questions.answer:
The average distance between the Earth and the Moon is 238,900 miles (384,400 kilometers). This distance varies because the Moon's orbit around the Earth is not a perfect circle. The Moon's closest approach to Earth is called perigee, and its farthest distance is called apogee. The perigee distance is 225,622 miles (363,304 kilometers), and the apogee distance is 252,088 miles (405,504 kilometers).

The Moon's orbit around the Earth takes 27.3 days to complete. The Moon also rotates on its axis at the same rate, so the same side of the Moon always faces the Earth. This is why we never see the far side of the Moon from Earth.

The Moon's gravity has a significant effect on the Earth. It causes the tides, and it also helps to stabilize the Earth's rotation. Without the Moon, the Earth's day would be much shorter, and the weather would be much more extreme.

The Moon is a very important part of the Earth's system. It has played a major role in the evolution of life on Earth, and it continues to be a source of fascination and wonder.

Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger created Instagram in October 2010. Systrom was the CEO and Krieger was the CTO. The app was originally called Burbn, but it was renamed Instagram in July 2011. Instagram was acquired by Facebook in April 2012 for $1 billion. Systrom and Krieger left Instagram in September 2018.

A man walks into a bar and orders a drink. As he sits there, he hears a high-pitched voice say, "Hey, those jeans look really great on you!"

The man looks around but sees nothing. He then returns to his drink thinking nothing more of it. But then, a moment later, he hears the same voice again, "I really like what you have done with your hair!"

The man again glances around but sees nothing. Now he wonders if should visit a doctor as he clearly seems to be hallucinating. He calmes himself down but then as he believes the voice is gone, he hears, "You seem like an awesome person!"

He puts his drink down, completely scared and looks around wildly. Still unable to find the source of the voice, he calls over to the bartender, "Hey! What's that voice I keep hearing?"

"Those are the peanuts," the bartender replies. "They're complimentary."

questions.questions: name me some protein rich foods.
questions.answer:
Here are some protein rich foods:

* Meat: Chicken, beef, pork, lamb, fish, seafood
* Eggs: Whole eggs are a great source of protein and other nutrients.
* Dairy: Milk, cheese, yogurt, cottage cheese
* Beans and legumes: Lentils, beans, chickpeas, peanuts, soybeans
* Nuts and seeds: Almonds, walnuts, peanuts, chia seeds, flax seeds
* Whole grains: Quinoa, brown rice, oats, barley
* Vegetables: Broccoli, spinach, kale, Brussels sprouts
* Fruits: Avocado, berries, bananas, apples
* Protein powders: Whey protein, casein protein, egg protein

It is important to note that the amount of protein in a food can vary depending on the serving size. For example, a 3-ounce serving of chicken breast contains about 27 grams of protein, while a 1-cup serving of black beans contains about 7 grams of protein.

It is also important to note that the quality of protein can vary depending on the food. Animal-based proteins, such as meat, fish, eggs, and dairy, are considered to be complete proteins, meaning they contain all nine essential amino acids that the body cannot produce on its own. Plant-based proteins, such as beans, legumes, nuts, and seeds, are considered to be incomplete proteins, meaning they do not contain all nine essential amino acids. However, it is possible to combine different plant-based proteins to create a complete protein. For example, a meal that includes rice and beans would provide all nine essential amino acids.

The recommended daily intake of protein for adults is 0.8 grams per kilogram of body weight. However, athletes and people who are trying to build muscle may need to consume more protein. It is important to talk to a registered dietitian or other qualified healthcare professional to determine how much protein you need.

If you want to edit Wikipedia, you can create an account and sign in. Once you are signed in, you can edit any article on Wikipedia. To edit an article, click on the "Edit" button at the top of the page.

Wikipedia is a valuable resource for information on a wide range of topics. It is constantly being updated with new information, and it is free to use.

Pluto is a dwarf planet in the Kuiper belt, located in the outermost region of the Solar System. It was discovered in 1930 by Clyde Tombaugh and was originally classified as the ninth planet from the Sun. However, in 2006, the International Astronomical Union (IAU) reclassified Pluto as a dwarf planet because it did not meet the IAU's definition of a planet.

Pluto is about two-thirds the size of the Moon and has a diameter of about 2,370 kilometers. It is made up of mostly ice and rock, and has a very thin atmosphere. Pluto has five moons: Charon, Nix, Hydra, Kerberos, and Styx. Charon is the largest moon and is about half the size of Pluto.

Pluto's orbit is very elliptical and takes 248 Earth years to complete. It is also tilted at an angle of 17 degrees to the plane of the ecliptic. This means that Pluto can sometimes be closer to the Sun than Neptune.

Pluto was once considered the ninth planet from the Sun, but it was reclassified as a dwarf planet in 2006. This was because the IAU defined a planet as a celestial body that (a) is in orbit around the Sun, (b) has sufficient mass for its self-gravity to overcome rigid body forces so that it assumes a hydrostatic equilibrium (nearly round) shape, and (c) has cleared the neighborhood around its orbit. Pluto does not meet the third criterion, as it shares its orbit with many other objects in the Kuiper belt.

Pluto is a very interesting and unique object in the Solar System. It is the only dwarf planet that has been visited by a spacecraft, the New Horizons spacecraft in 2015. New Horizons provided us with stunning images of Pluto and its moons, and helped us to learn more about this distant world.

Narendra Modi is the 14th and current prime minister of India, in office since 2014. He was the chief minister of Gujarat from 2001 to 2014 and is the leader of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). Modi is a member of the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS), a Hindu nationalist volunteer organisation.

Modi was born into a poor family in Vadnagar, Gujarat, in 1950. He joined the RSS at the age of eight and became a full-time worker at the age of 17. He was appointed general secretary of the BJP in Gujarat in 1985 and became chief minister of the state in 2001.

Modi's tenure as chief minister was marked by economic growth and development, but also by communal violence. In 2002, there were riots in Gujarat in which more than 1,000 people, mostly Muslims, were killed. Modi was accused of not doing enough to stop the violence, but he was never charged with any crime.

Modi led the BJP to victory in the 2014 Indian general election. He became the first prime minister to be born after India's independence in 1947. Modi has been a controversial figure, but he is also one of the most popular leaders in India. He has been praised for his economic reforms and his efforts to improve India's image abroad. However, he has also been criticized for his Hindu nationalist views and his authoritarian style of leadership.

Modi is a complex and controversial figure. He is a strong leader who has achieved significant economic growth for India. However, he is also a Hindu nationalist who has been accused of human rights abuses. It is too early to say what his legacy will be, but he is sure to be a major figure in Indian history.

Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company that produces computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. Its best known software products are the Microsoft Windows line of operating systems, the Microsoft Office suite, and the Internet Explorer and Edge web browsers. Its flagship hardware products are the Xbox video game consoles and the Microsoft Surface lineup of touchscreen personal computers. As of 2016, it is the world's largest software maker by revenue. It is one of the Big Five American information technology companies, with Amazon, Apple, Google, and Facebook.

Microsoft was founded by Bill Gates and Paul Allen on April 4, 1975, to develop and sell BASIC interpreters for the Altair 8800. It rose to dominate the personal computer operating system market with MS-DOS in the mid-1980s, followed by Windows. The company's 1986 initial public offering (IPO), the largest in history at the time, raised $616 million. Over the next few years, Microsoft expanded rapidly, acquiring companies such as Skype and LinkedIn. The company's Windows operating system became the world's most widely used operating system by the late 1990s. In the 2000s, Microsoft faced antitrust scrutiny in the United States and Europe. The company has since diversified its business, acquiring businesses and developing new products in the fields of cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and consumer electronics.

Microsoft is headquartered in Redmond, Washington. It has over 180,000 employees worldwide. The company has been criticized for its business practices, including its monopoly power in the personal computer operating system market, its aggressive sales tactics, and its use of restrictive licensing terms. However, Microsoft has also been praised for its innovative products and services, its commitment to corporate social responsibility, and its role in the development of the personal computer industry.

In 2022, Microsoft was ranked No. 14 in the Fortune 500 list of the largest United States corporations by total revenue.

questions.questions: who is the first primeminister if india ?
questions.answer:
Jawaharlal Nehru was the first prime minister of India. He was a prominent Indian nationalist who served as the first Prime Minister of India from 15 August 1947 until his death on 27 May 1964. He was also the leader of the Indian National Congress (INC) from 1929 to 1954.

Nehru was born into a Kashmiri Pandit family in Allahabad, British India. His father, Motilal Nehru, was a prominent lawyer and nationalist leader. Nehru was educated at Harrow School and Trinity College, Cambridge, where he studied natural sciences. After graduating from Cambridge, he returned to India and joined the Indian National Congress.

Nehru was a close associate of Mahatma Gandhi and played a leading role in the Indian independence movement. He was imprisoned several times by the British colonial government for his political activities. In 1930, he led the Salt March, a major protest against the British salt monopoly.

After India gained independence in 1947, Nehru became the first prime minister of the new nation. He served in this position until his death in 1964. During his tenure, he oversaw the country's transition to a secular, democratic republic. He also played a key role in the establishment of the Non-Aligned Movement.

Nehru was a charismatic and visionary leader who is considered one of the founding fathers of modern India. He is widely respected for his role in the country's independence and for his contributions to its development.

A Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) is a three-year undergraduate degree program in computer science. It is a popular course among students who want to pursue a career in the IT industry. After completing a BCA, you can work in a variety of fields, including software development, web development, data science, and artificial intelligence. You can also work in the IT support industry, as a computer technician or network administrator.

If you are interested in starting your own business, a BCA can give you the skills and knowledge you need to be successful. You can use your knowledge of computer science to develop new products or services, or to create a website or online store.

A BCA is a versatile degree that can lead to a variety of career opportunities. If you are interested in a career in the IT industry, a BCA is a great place to start.

Here are some of the career opportunities after BCA:

* Software developer: Software developers design, develop, and test software applications. They use their knowledge of computer science to create software that meets the needs of users.
* Web developer: Web developers design, develop, and maintain websites. They use their knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create websites that are both functional and visually appealing.
* Data scientist: Data scientists collect, analyze, and interpret data. They use their knowledge of statistics and machine learning to extract insights from data that can be used to improve business decisions.
* Artificial intelligence (AI) engineer: AI engineers develop and maintain AI systems. They use their knowledge of computer science and artificial intelligence to create systems that can learn and make decisions on their own.
* Computer technician: Computer technicians install, repair, and maintain computer hardware and software. They use their knowledge of computer hardware and software to troubleshoot problems and keep computers running smoothly.
* Network administrator: Network administrators design, install, and maintain computer networks. They use their knowledge of computer networking to ensure that networks are secure and reliable.
* Business owner: If you are interested in starting your own business, a BCA can give you the skills and knowledge you need to be successful. You can use your knowledge of computer science to develop new products or services, or to create a website or online store.

These are just a few of the many career opportunities available to BCA graduates. With the right skills and experience, you can find a job that is both challenging and rewarding.

An advanced university is a type of higher education institution that offers specialized programs and courses at the graduate and postgraduate levels. Advanced universities are typically located in major cities and have a strong focus on research and innovation. They often have close ties to industry and government, and their graduates are highly sought-after by employers.

There are many different types of advanced universities, each with its own unique focus and strengths. Some of the most common types of advanced universities include:

* Research universities: These universities are known for their world-class research facilities and faculty. They offer a wide range of graduate and postgraduate programs, and their graduates are often highly successful in academia, government, and industry.
* Professional schools: These universities offer specialized programs in fields such as law, medicine, business, and engineering. They are known for their rigorous academic programs and their close ties to the professions they serve.
* Liberal arts colleges: These universities offer a broad-based education in the liberal arts and sciences. They are known for their small class sizes, close student-faculty relationships, and commitment to undergraduate education.

Advanced universities offer a number of advantages over other types of higher education institutions. They typically have larger endowments, which allow them to invest in state-of-the-art facilities and resources. They also have more resources to support research and innovation. In addition, advanced universities often have a more selective admissions process, which means that their students are typically more academically prepared.

If you are considering attending an advanced university, there are a few things you should keep in mind. First, you should research the different types of advanced universities to find one that is a good fit for your interests and goals. Second, you should make sure that you are academically prepared for the rigors of advanced study. Finally, you should be prepared to invest in your education, both financially and in terms of time and effort.

Attending an advanced university can be a life-changing experience. It can open up doors to new opportunities and help you achieve your goals. If you are serious about your education and your future, then an advanced university may be the right choice for you.

questions.questions: who is the best cricket player
questions.answer:
Sachin Tendulkar is widely regarded as the greatest batsman of all time. He is the leading run-scorer of all time in international cricket, with 34,357 runs in 664 matches. He also holds the record for the most centuries in international cricket, with 100. Tendulkar was a right-handed batsman and occasional right-arm off break bowler. He played for India from 1989 to 2013. He was the captain of the Indian team from 1996 to 2000 and again from 2007 to 2011. Tendulkar was a member of the Indian team that won the 2011 Cricket World Cup. He was awarded the Bharat Ratna, India's highest civilian award, in 2014.

Other great cricket players include Don Bradman, Viv Richards, Brian Lara, Ricky Ponting, and Jacques Kallis. Bradman is widely regarded as the greatest batsman of all time. He is the only batsman to have scored a Test average of over 100. Richards is a West Indian cricketer who is considered one of the greatest all-rounders of all time. Lara is a West Indian cricketer who is the only batsman to have scored a triple century in Test cricket. Ponting is an Australian cricketer who is the most successful Test captain of all time. Kallis is a South African cricketer who is the only player to have scored 13,000 runs and taken 300 wickets in both Test and ODI cricket.

Virat Kohli is an Indian international cricketer who captains the Indian national team in all formats of the game. He is a right-handed top-order batsman and occasional right-arm off break bowler. He is the former captain of the Royal Challengers Bangalore in the Indian Premier League (IPL). He is widely regarded as one of the greatest batsmen of all time.

Kohli was born in Delhi on 5 November 1988. He made his Test debut for India in 2008 and his One Day International (ODI) debut in 2009. He became the captain of the Indian team in all formats in 2013. He is the only batsman to have scored more than 20,000 runs in ODI cricket and more than 7,000 runs in Test cricket. He is also the only batsman to have scored more than 10,000 runs in both formats of the game in a calendar year.

Kohli has won numerous awards for his cricketing achievements. He has been named the ICC ODI Player of the Year twice, the ICC Test Player of the Year once, and the ICC Cricketer of the Year once. He has also been named the Wisden Cricketer of the Year.

Kohli is a very popular figure in India. He is known for his aggressive batting style and his passion for the game. He is also known for his fitness and his dedication to his craft. He is a role model for many young cricketers in India and around the world.

Kohli is married to Anushka Sharma, an Indian actress. They have a daughter together.
